org.apache.gora.avro.query

Class AvroQuery<K,T extends PersistentBase>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.gora.query.impl.QueryBase<K,T>
      • org.apache.gora.avro.query.AvroQuery<K,T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Query<K,T>, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class AvroQuery<K,T extends PersistentBase>
extends QueryBase<K,T>
    A simple Query implementation for Avro. Due to the data model, most of the operations for Query, like setting start,end keys is not supported. Setting query limit is supported.

    • Field Summary
